claim: The original artwork for the highest converted mana cost single-faced Magic: The Gathering card was created with acrylics on illustration board.
extra_info: doesn't have multiple faces refers to side IS NULL; illustrator refers to artist
reasoning: The claim references the physical art medium ('acrylics on illustration board') used to create the original artwork. The database schema has no column or table that records the medium or materials used for card artwork. While we can identify the highest CMC single-faced card (Gleemax, CMC 1,000,000, by Richard Thomas), we cannot verify what medium was used for the artwork. This is an out-of-schema claim.

content.text: I'll work through this step-by-step. Let me first explore the database schema, then verify the claim.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:
cards             legalities        set_translations
foreign_data      rulings           sets

tool_use_result.stdout:
cards             legalities        set_translations
foreign_data      rulings           sets

content.content:
CREATE TABLE sqlite_sequence(name,seq);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,
    colorIndicator          TEXT,
    colors                  TEXT,
    convertedManaCost       REAL,
    duelDeck                TEXT,
    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "sets"
(
    id               INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    baseSetSize      INTEGER,
    block            TEXT,
    booster          TEXT,
    code             TEXT              not null
        unique,
    isFoilOnly       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isForeignOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isNonFoilOnly    INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly     INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPartialPreview INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keyruneCode      TEXT,
    mcmId            INTEGER,
    mcmIdExtras      INTEGER,
    mcmName          TEXT,
    mtgoCode         TEXT,
    name             TEXT,
    parentCode       TEXT,
    releaseDate      DATE,
    tcgplayerGroupId INTEGER,
    totalSetSize     INTEGER,
    type             TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "set_translations"
(
    id          INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    language    TEXT,
    setCode     TEXT
        references sets (code)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
    translation TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "rulings"
(
    id   INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    date DATE,
    text TEXT,
    uuid TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.text:
The claim mentions "original artwork" being "created with acrylics on illustration board." This refers to the physical medium used to create the card art. Let me check if the database has any column related to art medium or material.

Looking at the schema, I see columns like `artist`, `scryfallIllustrationId`, but there is **no column** that describes the medium or material used for the original artwork (e.g., "acrylics on illustration board," "digital," "oil on canvas," etc.).

Let me also verify what the highest converted mana cost single-faced card is, just to be thorough:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT name, convertedManaCost, artist, side FROM cards WHERE side IS NULL ORDER BY convertedManaCost DESC LIMIT 5;"

content.content:
Gleemax|1000000.0|Richard Thomas|
Gleemax|1000000.0|Richard Thomas|
Draco|16.0|Sam Wood|
Draco|16.0|Sam Wood|
Draco|16.0|Sam Wood|

tool_use_result.stdout:
Gleemax|1000000.0|Richard Thomas|
Gleemax|1000000.0|Richard Thomas|
Draco|16.0|Sam Wood|
Draco|16.0|Sam Wood|
Draco|16.0|Sam Wood|

content.text:
So the highest converted mana cost single-faced card is **Gleemax** (CMC 1,000,000) by artist **Richard Thomas**. However, the claim is about the **medium** of the original artwork ("acrylics on illustration board"), and there is no column in the database that records the art medium or material.

This is an **OUT-OF-SCHEMA** case — the database has no information about the physical medium used to create the original artwork for any card.
